participant_2.background:
I love to listen to pop music to cheer myself up when I'm feeling down.
i love the outdoors.
I want to conquer my anxiety so I can live my life to the fullest.
I want to live somewhere where I can wear purple all the time and listen to Iron Maiden as loud as I want.

content.text: Not much, just hanging out and listening to some pop music to cheer me up. I've been feeling kind of down lately.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. What's wrong?
Well, I'm not sure if you know this, but I have anxiety. And it's been really bad lately.
Oh, I'm sorry. I know how that can be. I have anxiety too.
Really? That's actually really comforting to know. I don't know a lot of people who have anxiety.
Yeah, it's not very common. But it's definitely something that can be managed.
Yeah, I'm trying to figure out how to manage it.
Well, I know that it helps me to talk about it. And I also like to exercise.
Yeah, I've heard that exercise can help. I've been trying to do more of that, but it's hard to find the time.
I know what you mean. It's hard to find the time to do anything when you have anxiety.
That's all you can do. Just keep trying. And if you ever need someone to talk to, I'm always here for you.
